room_title: Escape room "Murder at Mystery Manor" by Escape from Mystery Manor in Boise
review: Had a very fun experience the event kept us engaged the whole time, would recommend to anyone who wants a good time.

room_title: Escape room "Murder at Mystery Manor" by Escape from Mystery Manor in Boise
review: The hosts were great and the team building event was a lot of fun. Very well organized and planned out.

room_title: Escape room "Murder at Mystery Manor" by Escape from Mystery Manor in Boise
review: My husband and I have done several escape rooms before, but this was our first attempt at trying one by ourselves.
